resources.string: Tap on the top image to play startup and death sound
Tap on the top image to play startup sound
This model does not have startup or death sound
Tap below to access more specifications
The current volume is high. Do you want to continue playing?\n Select \"Confirm\" to turn this warning off temporarily.
Antique to advanced, history in your hand. Thanks for installing MacIndex. Open the drawer to access more.

Sorry, a preference file invalidate is necessary after a major update. Your usage record parameters that mainly used by the program will be cleared, but your preferences will be kept. After you confirm, MacIndex will quit. Then you can use it normally.
Open the EveryMac page of the model directly instead of the specification page. Will ask for specific configuration if the model has more than one configurations.
This is effective for both main page and search result. Random access will no longer available as well.
Play startup and death sound alternatively in the specification page, or play the startup sound only.
Enable high volume warning when using headphones in the specification page.
Enable left and right swipes to navigate between models in the specification page.
Enable buttons to navigate between models in the specification page.
Use an alternative method to make navigation faster between machines in the specification page.
Only pick random machines inside the current group instead of all categories.
Save the last selected viewing method and category filter.
Save the last used search keyword and filter.

Your usage record parameters that mainly used by the program will be cleared, but your preferences will be kept. After you confirm, MacIndex will quit. This is helpful for troubleshooting, but cannot be undone.
Your saved preference file will be completely cleared, including your usage records and preferences. After you confirm, MacIndex will quit. This is helpful for troubleshooting, but cannot be undone.

MacIndex is a non-profit, and open source software that dedicated to educational and informational purposes. The main contributors are paizhang, Victor Jiao, and Mation Wang, 2019, 2020, 2021. The logo was designed by Mation Wang, other use is prohibited unless the permission was granted. Please abide the open source licence.

Machine information, images, and sounds are collected online, mainly from Mactracker, EveryMac, and Wikipedia. No copyrighted information is used, but if you have any questions, please contact the developer immediately. Apple Macintosh names, Intel names, and logos are registered trademarks.

MacIndex does not guarantee that all content of the software is completely accurate, and does not guarantee its reliability. All consequences caused by the use of the software shall be borne by the user.

Please report error and give feedback to the developer. You can access more information including contact information, and get helps and updates on the Official Website (https://MacIndex.paizhang.info/v/English/).
Invalid Input (Please refer to the Official Website)
Old world Macintosh does not have Identification and EMC Number. Please use the Gestalt ID instead. Please also refer to the Official Website.
New world Macintosh does not have a Gestalt ID. Please use the Identification instead. Please also refer to the Official Website.
More than one configurations were found for this model. Please make a selection then confirm.
Due to sale region or special purpose, this model is not available in EveryMac
Please report the bug to the developer. Please refer to the Official Website for more information.
